reporter_caption.center: CITY OF EUNICE v. ACADIANA TIRE SHOP, 535 So.2d 1287 (La.App. 3 Cir. 1988)

caption.center: CITY OF EUNICE, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT v. ACADIANA TIRE SHOP, INC.,

court.center: Court of Appeal of Louisiana, Third Circuit.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Eunice City Court, Parish of St. Landry; Kenneth Boagni, Jr., Ad Hoc, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Tate McManus, Kearney Tate, Eunice, for plaintiff/appellant.
Guillory, McGee Fontenot, A. Frank McGee, Eunice, Dean, Lomenick Seemann, C. Frederick Seemann, Lafayette, Young, Burson, Joseph B. Ortego, Eunice, for defendant-appellee.
opinion.panel: Before STOKER, LABORDE and KING, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] For reasons assigned in St. Landry Parish School Boardvs. Acadiana Tire Shop, Inc., 535 So.2d 1283 (La.App. 3 Cir. 1988), the judgment of the trial court is affirmed.
[2] AFFIRMED.
